front.title: Analysis of Generalized MPLS-based Recovery Mechanisms (including Protection and Restoration)

abstract.t: This document provides an analysis grid that can be used toevaluate, compare and contrast the numerous Generalized MPLS(GMPLS)-based recovery mechanisms currently proposed at the CCAMPWorking Group. A detailed analysis of each of the recovery phases isprovided using the terminology defined in [CCAMP-TERM]. Also, thisdocument focuses on transport plane survivability and recoveryissues and not on control plane resilience and related aspects.
